name: House of Bill
description:
House of Bill is a short political simulation written with the Ren’Py engine. In this game, you can make a bill to do whatever you want, and you must bribe your way to Congress to get your bill passed, and ultimately you will even get the chance to bribe the President. I made this game to test out Ren’Py, and I’m quite happy with the result.

Official website:

https://houseofbill.wordpress.com/
